What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Business&Finance > Small Business > Resolved Question Pete Member since: April 18, 2008 Total points: 479 (Level 2) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » Average number of customers per day at fast food / fast casual restaurant.? Hi, I am doing a research for a school project and I need to get a rough estimate of customers a fast food or a fast and casual restaurant in a large or large to medium city. The restaurant could either be in residential areas such as neighborhood centers or in business places. Can anybody from food industry give me any estates? 4 years ago Report Abuse by aliciali... Member since: April 30, 2008 Total points: 31,472 (Level 7) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters Not really...I live in a very small town now and the fast food restaurants and other restaurants vary so much, but one fast food restaurant has tons of customers yet in a large city I used to live in...same kind of fast food restaurnat hardly had any customers and in general all restaurants varied to extremes. The best suggestion I can give is to actually call a variety of local restaurants to you and ask them.
Truthfully, I think you are just trying to get others to do your homework...you won't learn if you don't put the effort in yourself....I've already told yo what to do and you should have takent initiative to do it yourself. 4 years ago Report Abuse 100% 1 Vote Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting!
